title: The Downpour
marks:
Signature

see Signed LRC on a-d and f, LLC on e, in black, in plate: [F
description:
Plate II
group of 6 woodcuts matted together; a:  people standing behind a railing; b:  crowd in a station; c:  crowd and animals in front of stairs, in wind and rain; d:  people walking behind a curtain being parted by a man in a fez accompanied by a man playing a horn; e:  crowd of people with little girl in front; f:  faces of crowd with fireworks overhead
creditline: The Mr. and Mrs. Bernard M. Granum Fund
